metadata.title: CVE-2016-2087 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in the client in HexChat 2.11.0 allowsremote IRC servers to read or modify arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) inthe server name.

criterions.comment: hexchat: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
xchat-gnome package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
